definition: to cast/to send/to throw oneself (into the river etc)/to seek refuge/to place oneself into the hands of

mark/sign/label/to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc/to bear (a brand name, registration number etc)/prize/award/bid/target/quota/(old) the topmost branches of a tree/visible symptom/classifier for military units

pinyin: zu1 di4 ren2 tou2 biao1 piao4 quan2

sentences.english: Other pad irons not to be supplied along with equipments shall be provided by the bidder.
sentences.chinese: 設備未附帶的其它墊鐵由投標人提供。

sentences.english: An invitation for submission of bid shall clearly contain the particulars set forth in Paragraph 2 of Article 16 of this Law.
sentences.chinese: 投標邀請書應當載明本法第十六條第二款規定的事項。

sentences.english: Developer will sign an agreement with each participant for the fee payment.
sentences.chinese: 承辦方將與各投標單位簽訂協議，以支付相應費用。

sentences.english: Where do we submit the tender?
You is invited to tender for construction of two tugboat.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎投標建造兩艘拖船。

sentences.english: Upon receiving the bid documents, the bid inviter shall sign for and safe-keep them but may not open them.
sentences.chinese: 招標人收到投標文件後，應當簽收保存，不得開啓。

sentences.english: Prices on the item tender offer sheet shall be filled out in the following manner.
sentences.chinese: 投標分項報價表上的價格應按下列方式分開填寫。

sentences.english: Decided not to bid on the roll-top desk.
sentences.chinese: 決定不投標那張頂蓋可捲縮的寫字檯。

sentences.english: Domestic bidders-Arbitration is conducted under Chinese rules.
sentences.chinese: 國內投標人按中國仲裁法進行仲裁。

sentences.english: Bids will only be considered with a sample article on a topic that I choose.
sentences.chinese: 投標僅被認爲與上一個話題，我選擇的樣本文章。

sentences.english: The bid-tender system in project construction field of China has already been overall carried out.
sentences.chinese: 我國在工程建設領域已全面推行招標投標制度。

sentences.english: It is important for the designing department to make the correct bidding decision-making.
sentences.chinese: 能否做出正確的投標決策是設計單位競標的關鍵。

sentences.english: If the number of bidders is less than three, the tenderer shall issue the tender anew according to this Law.
sentences.chinese: 投標人少於三個的，招標人應當依照本法重新招標。

sentences.english: Company reserves the right to modify the ITB Documents following issue of the same to the Bidder.
sentences.chinese: 公司有權修改後的招標文件的投標人同樣的問題。

sentences.english: All bids over budget will be hidden, and ignored.
sentences.chinese: 超過預算的所有投標將被隱藏，被忽略。

sentences.english: We bid for the erection of a multistory building.

definition: to borrow or lend money/debit and credit items on a balance sheet
property/real estate/abbr. for 物業管理|物业管理[wu4 ye4 guan3 li3], property management
to undertake to purchase sth/to subscribe (to share issue)
bid or tender submission or delivery/bid or tender document
